description:
Odaiba! It’s vacation time for Ran and her friends, and this time Ran is playing Aya’s wingman in the quest for Rei’s love. But when Ran gets separated from the rest of the group, she finds herself accepting a challenge from Mami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Odaiba Excitement! Crackling Action! The Great Final Battle!
お台場♥バチバチ→大決戦!
